actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committees on Armed Services, and Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife, and Fisheries

official_title: To reauthorize the National Oceanographic Partnership Program, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Oceanographic Partnership Program Revitalization Act

summary.text:
National Oceanographic Partnership Program Revitalization Act or the NOPP Revitalization Act

This bill directs the Department of the Navy to establish the National Oceanographic Partnership Program the purpose of which, among other things, is to promote the national goals of assuring national security, advancing economic development, protecting quality of life, ensuring environmental stewardship, and strengthening science education and communication through improved knowledge of the ocean. The bill also establishes (1) an Ocean Policy Committee, and (2) an Ocean Research Advisory Panel.

titles.title: National Oceanographic Partnership Program Revitalization Act
To reauthorize the National Oceanographic Partnership Program, and for other purposes.
